item.description:
Its a New Year with New SEO Goals for 2007!


Boston SEO Group meets the first monday of each month. However Janurary first being new years. will push it out two the 2nd monday.

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England to join us.

We also invite local Boston business owners to be our guest website to be reviewed.


SEO Meeting Agenda:

Introductions

Guest Start Up Websites to be reviewed this month:

1.

Peter Caputa
Founder
WhizSpark Corporation
www.whizspark.com

See a video about Peter's start up at http://www.zbiz.tv/ca...

&

2.

Founders from www.Foodler.com

&

3. Founder from www.MyBikeOnline.com


Please review prior and bring your seo tips to share.



10 min each roundtable on seo challenges and tips

10 min round table open discussion for what goals you plan to achieve in 2007! So that as a group we can help each other out in 2007.

10 min discussion on growing this group from its active membership base!


We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!

Cambridge SEO MeetUp Group

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: New Year SEO Goals: Plan to support your local boston seo internet consultants
